diamond.manager

Class ShaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • diamond.manager.AbstractManager
      • diamond.manager.ShaderManager

  • public class ShaderManager
extends AbstractManager
    Die Klasse ShaderManager verwaltet die Shader Programme

    0.1 pre-alpha, 2013-02-21
    Author:
    Uwe Wilko Gruenefeld
